mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sales( name, price, custid, custname, progress, lasttime, userid, username, successtime) VALUES (#{name},#{price},#{custid},#{custname},#{progress},#{lasttime},#{userid},#{username},#{successtime})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sales SET lasttime = #{lasttime},successtime=#{successtime},progress=#{progress} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sales WHERE custid = #{custId} order by id desc
